short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any page into a way to thank mr skeltal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the button to thank mr skeltal!

Features include:
* "Spooky Scary Skeletons" by Andrew Gold 
* Replaces that boring old cursor with a spooky skull
* Dancing skeletons rain down upon your screen
* Lots and lots of skeleton gifs!
